import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Sap Components Entities


## 3rd party identity provider / identity management

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="Preview">

![](./component-3rd-party-identity-provider-identity-management.png#drawio)

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Usage">
    
```js
import { Component3rdPartyIdentityProviderIdentityManagement } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<Component3rdPartyIdentityProviderIdentityManagement/>

// or

import { extendStyle } from "@dinghy/base-components";
import { COMPONENT_3RD_PARTY_IDENTITY_PROVIDER_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<Shape 
  {...props}
  _style={extendStyle(props, COMPONENT_3RD_PARTY_IDENTITY_PROVIDER_IDENTITY_MANAGEMENT)}
  />

```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Definition">
    
```js
{
  _style: {
    entity: 'shape=image;editableCssRules=.*;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;labelBackgroundColor=default;verticalAlign=top;aspect=fixed;imageAspect=0;image=data:image/svg+xml,;strokeColor=none;',
  },
  _original_width: 50,
  _original_height: 50,

}
```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>


## Bigger SAP Box with multiple layers

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="Preview">

![](./bigger-sap-box-with-multiple-layers.png#drawio)

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Usage">
    
```js
import { BiggerSapBoxWithMultipleLayers } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<BiggerSapBoxWithMultipleLayers/>

// or

import { extendStyle } from "@dinghy/base-components";
import { BIGGER_SAP_BOX_WITH_MULTIPLE_LAYERS } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<Shape 
  {...props}
  _style={extendStyle(props, BIGGER_SAP_BOX_WITH_MULTIPLE_LAYERS)}
  />

```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Definition">
    
```js
{
  _style: {
    entity: 'rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#0070F2;fillColor=#EBF8FF;arcSize=24;absoluteArcSize=1;imageWidth=64;imageHeight=64;strokeWidth=1.5;',
  },
  _width: 0,
  _height: 250,
}
```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>


## BTP Basic Layer

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="Preview">

![](./btp-basic-layer.png#drawio)

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Usage">
    
```js
import { BtpBasicLayer } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<BtpBasicLayer/>

// or

import { extendStyle } from "@dinghy/base-components";
import { BTP_BASIC_LAYER } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<Shape 
  {...props}
  _style={extendStyle(props, BTP_BASIC_LAYER)}
  />

```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Definition">
    
```js
{
  _style: {
    entity: 'rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#0070F2;fillColor=#EBF8FF;arcSize=32;absoluteArcSize=1;strokeWidth=1.5;',
  },
  _width: 0,
  _height: 250,
}
```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>


## Non-SAP Content

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="Preview">

![](./non-sap-content.png#drawio)

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Usage">
    
```js
import { NonSapContent } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<NonSapContent/>

// or

import { extendStyle } from "@dinghy/base-components";
import { NON_SAP_CONTENT } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<Shape 
  {...props}
  _style={extendStyle(props, NON_SAP_CONTENT)}
  />

```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Definition">
    
```js
{
  _style: {
    entity: 'rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#475E75;fillColor=#F5F6F7;arcSize=24;absoluteArcSize=1;imageWidth=64;imageHeight=64;strokeWidth=1.5;verticalAlign=top;align=left;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1;spacingTop=10;spacingLeft=20;',
  },
  _width: 0,
  _height: 440,
}
```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>


## SAP On-Premise Solution Box

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="Preview">

![](./sap-on-premise-solution-box.png#drawio)

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Usage">
    
```js
import { SapOnPremiseSolutionBox } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<SapOnPremiseSolutionBox/>

// or

import { extendStyle } from "@dinghy/base-components";
import { SAP_ON_PREMISE_SOLUTION_BOX } from '@dinghy/diagrams/entitiesSapComponents'

<Shape 
  {...props}
  _style={extendStyle(props, SAP_ON_PREMISE_SOLUTION_BOX)}
  />

```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="Definition">
    
```js
{
  _style: {
    entity: 'strokeColor=#0070F2;shadow=0;strokeWidth=2;rounded=1;absoluteArcSize=1;arcSize=20;',
  },
  _width: 0,
  _height: 70,
}
```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
